Title: Let the Bullets Fly
Writer: Junli Guo (screenplay), Wen Jiang (screenplay), Bukong Li (screenplay), Ma Shitu (adapted from ''Ye Tan Shi Ji'' by), Ping Shu (screenplay), Xiao Wei (screenplay), Sujin Zhu (screenplay)
Actors: Yun-Fat Chow, You Ge, Wen Jiang, Carina Lau
Plot: Set in China during the warring 1920s, notorious bandit chief Zhang descends upon a remote provincial town posing as its new mayor, an identity that he had hijacked from Old Tang, himself a small-time imposter. Hell-bent on making a fast buck, Zhang soon meets his match in the tyrannical local gentry Huang as a deadly battle of wit and brutality ensues.
Production: China Film Group Corp., Emperor Motion Pictures (International)
